sense.name: Move about in a confused or purposeless manner.
sense.examples: The children milled about in the parking lot. Who is that man milling around the building? Don't mill around in college, but seek to learn.

sense.name: Grind with a mill (or some other implement).
sense.examples: We mill the flour very fine for cake batters. This is a place to mill grain. Mill the silicon to a fine dust.

sense.name: Manipulate metal, possibly to produce currency.
sense.commentary: Note: production method is by rolling or pressing flat.
sense.examples: The department mills many coins. We milled foil for the exterior cover.
